thread.title: Gmail Sender Icons Adds Favicons to Gmail for Easier Skimming
thread.title_full: Gmail Sender Icons Adds Favicons to Gmail for Easier Skimming

author: Thorin Klosowski
title: Gmail Sender Icons Adds Favicons to Gmail for Easier Skimming
text:
Chrome: Favicons are great in browsers because they make it easy to discern one site from another in your tabs at a glance. Gmail Sender Icons takes that same approach to your Gmail’s inbox.
Advertisement
Gmail Sender Icons essentially adds in a small image that includes the favicon and web site domain of a sender’s email address to your inbox, making it easier to skim through emails. It’s a simple little visual trick, but it makes glancing through email a lot easier.
Gmail Sender Icons | Chrome Web Store via Digital Inspiration
Thorin Klosowski thorin@lifehacker.com @kingthor Senior Writer, Lifehacker
